mapper.select: SELECT ic.IC_ID AS icId, ic.IC_CONTENT AS icContent, ic.IC_RESOURCELINK AS icResourceLink, DATE_FORMAT(ic.IC_CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS icCreateDate, ic.IC_USERID AS icUserId, ic.IC_USERTYPE AS icUserType, ic.IC_INDENTID AS icIndentId FROM INDENT_COMMENT ic WHERE ic.IC_INDENTID= ${id} ORDER BY ic.IC_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE INDENT_COMMENT ic SET ic.IC_CONTENT =#{icContent}, ic.IC_INDENTID=${icIndentId}, ic.IC_RESOURCELINK=#{icResourceLink}, ic.IC_USERID=${icUserId}, ic.IC_USERTYPE=#{icUserType} WHERE ic.IC_ID=${icId};
